Hi there, I am Peter Kaizer

I am a user experience designer and developer with a passion for user focused digital products that are highly functional and beautifully designed.

Currently I am working as a Lead Technologist/UXUI Designer for Booz | Allen | Hamilton.

This is my personal web space, where I post about technology, design and food, along with other things that catch my eye. You can read more about me or contact me.

Also check out my recommended books site.

Follow me

None of the views expressed on this site or any of my personal social networks reflect the opinion of my employers or any of my freelance clients. They are my opinions alone.

Reading & Writing

Art Directing For The Web With CSS Grid 

Apr 13, 2018
Great post from the awesome Andy Clarke on using the new CSS grid specification to art direct the layout of web pages. This quote resonates with me, "If you’re at all serious about web design or development, you need to be serious about learning and using CSS Grid too."
(Permalink)
Apr 13, 2018

Iterative Design, Iterative Code 

Aug 11, 2016
Great post from Brad Frost on getting feedback from the indie web community and particularly from Jonathan Snook. this quote resonates with me, "Establishing this more collaborative, pattern-driven workflow means iterating over frontend code becomes a core and necessary part of the process."

HTML wireframes 

May 21, 2014
